pp2.6:1.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ, sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo. 1
pp2.6:2.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ, paccekasambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo. 2
pp2.6:3.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti, sāriputtamoggallānā tena daṭṭhabbā. 3
pp2.6:4.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṁ pāpuṇāti, avasesā arahantā tena daṭṭhabbā. 4
pp2.6:5.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ, anāgāmī tena daṭṭhabbo. 5
pp2.6:6.1: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, āgantā itthattaṁ, sotāpannasakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbā. 6
